## lightchain init

Initializes new lightchain node according to the configured flags.

### Synopsis

Initializes new lightchain node according to the configured flags.

```
lightchain init [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --datadir string   The main directory where all blockchain node data will be stored.
  -h, --help             help for init
```
